an4.101:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an4.101:2.8: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro valāhakūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4.101:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā hoti no vassitā?
an4.101:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo bhāsitā hoti, no kattā.
an4.101:3.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā hoti, no vassitā.
an4.101:3.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako gajjitā, no vassitā;
an4.101:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo vassitā hoti, no gajjitā?
an4.101:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kattā hoti, no bhāsitā.
an4.101:4.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo vassitā hoti, no gajjitā.
an4.101:4.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako vassitā, no gajjitā;
an4.101:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gajjitā hoti, no vassitā?
an4.101:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo neva bhāsitā hoti, no kattā.
an4.101:5.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gajjitā hoti, no vassitā.
an4.101:5.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako neva gajjitā, no vassitā;
an4.101:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā ca hoti vassitā ca?
an4.101:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo bhāsitā ca hoti kattā ca.
an4.101:6.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā ca hoti vassitā ca.
an4.101:6.4: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako gajjitā ca vassitā ca;
an4.101:6.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro valāhakūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
